Earthcube/ESIP Software Assessment Workshop
About

NASA Reuse Readiness Levels as a Google Sheet (comment only) and split by topic areas:

  • Documentation
  • Extensibility
  • Intellectual Property
  • Modularity
  • Packaging
  • Portability
  • Standards Compliance
  • Support
  • Verification and Testing

Definitions of the RRLs and Topics can be found in the RRL PDF (above).

Earthcube/ESIP Software Assessment Workshop

  • Add an issue

Draft guidelines specific to the EC workshop, reorganized based on EC priorities and clarity.
